name: Nahida
storytext: The panacea brings purity, and from the palace depths is spring renewed.
source: Reward for inviting Nahida to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: All Schemes to Know
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], applies <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C117031]</color> to target character. If the target character already has <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C117031]</color> applied to them, then apply <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C117031]</color> to all opposing characters instead.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#7EC236FF>Dendro DMG</color>, applies <color=#FFFFFFFF>Seed of Skandha</color> to target character. If the target character already has <color=#FFFFFFFF>Seed of Skandha</color> applied to them, then apply <color=#FFFFFFFF>Seed of Skandha</color> to all opposing characters instead.
skills.description: Deals 2 Dendro DMG, applies Seed of Skandha to target character. If the target character already has Seed of Skandha applied to them, then apply Seed of Skandha to all opposing characters instead.

skills.name: Illusory Heart
